content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As you can remember, the Company's QMS is being constantly developed and improved, and you – EPAM employees – play a very important role in this process. Send us your notes and suggestions regarding the processes and best practices via \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/ess.do\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Service Portal\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (the QMS Support Requests section), or you can also send your request to WFT Internal Auditors. If your work requires some templates, sample project documents or you have any questions concerning using PAL, you can always send a request to\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFTPAL@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFTPAL@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". More detailed information about the services provided by the SEPG Team can be found here: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pal.epam.com/pal_method_plugin/guidances/supportingmaterials/SupportRequest_30A1908E.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"QMS Support Request\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have questions regarding this section, please seek assistance to your Manager. Or send them to:  \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFTPAL@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFTPAL@epam.com\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
